rules_text:
Flying, lifelink
When Sentry enters, other creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.
At the beginning of your end step, you may sacrifice Sentry. If you do, return him to the battlefield transformed at the beginning
of your next upkeep.
rules_text2:
Flying
When Void enters, for each player, you choose from among the permanents that player controls an artifact, a creature, an enchantment, and a planeswalker. Then each player sacrifices all nonland permanents they control not chosen this way.
